data.title: Who is the primary contact for this policy?
data.subtitle: This person will receive all communications from Newfront about this policy. You can change this contact information later. If you’re not sure, just add your contact information.

fields.label: What is your Federal Employer Identification Number? (FEIN)
In which states do you operate?
What’s the name of the clinic, physician, or ER used for work injuries?
Do you provide group medical insurance?
Do you offer a retirement or pension plan?
Please provide details about the paid vacation

data.title: How do you want to pay for your policy?

options.title: I want to pay Newfront
options.subtitle: You’ll pay Newfront instead of paying each insurance company separately. There are no fees.

options.title: I want to pay the insurance company directly
options.subtitle: You’ll receive bills from the insurance company and it will be your responsibility to make sure they are paid to keep your coverage.
